items.sentence: Tom was already there by the time I got there.
Have you ever seen Tom do something like that?
There's a good chance that Tom won't be there.
Is there a place I can go fishing around here?
It won't be as much fun as you think it'll be.
We need to take advantage of this opportunity.
I don't think that Tom would actually do that.
There are various kinds of candy in that bowl.
Tom has seen things he was never meant to see.
It took nearly three months to build our barn.
Tom kept texting Mary, but she didn't respond.
Tom doesn't need Mary's permission to do this.
I suspect Tom and Mary aren't able to do that.
I know Tom is quicker at doing that than Mary.
We didn't expect anything like this to happen.
You need to learn to keep your anger in check.
My shoes are the same size as Tom's shoe size.
Tom weighs about three kilograms more than me.
You know that Tom likes to do that, don't you?
We can't live even one more day without water.
